history.proof: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc. unfold succ in Hsucc. rewrite <- (A_B m k x Hinv) in Hsucc. qsimpl time: 1 use: cA_B. destruct (eq_dart_dec x x) as [Hxx | Hxx]; try discriminate. destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x) as [Htx | Htx]; try discriminate. apply succ_bottom with (m := m) (k := k) (x := x); auto. - hauto use: A_B unfold: nil, succ. - hauto use: A_B, not_succ_top unfold: succ. - hauto use: A_B, succ_bottom, cA_B unfold: succ inv: sumbool. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: cA_B.

ctx: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc.
rewrite <- (A_B m k x Hinv) in Hsucc.
exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (cA_B m k x Hinv Hsucc) in Hsucc.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap k : dim x : dart Hinv : inv_hmap m Hsucc : A m k x <> A (B m k x) k x The term "Hinv" has type "inv_hmap m" while it is expected to have type "dart".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> A m k x <> cA (B m k x) k x

Premises:
inv_hmap = fix inv_hmap (m : fmap) : Prop := match m with | V => True | I m0 x _ _ => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_I m0 x | L m0 k0 x y => inv_hmap m0 /\ prec_L m0 k0 x y end : fmap -> Prop
A = fix A (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 _ _ _ => A m0 k x | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then y0 else A m0 k x else A m0 k x end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart
B = fix B (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) {struct m} : fmap := match m with | V => V | I m0 x0 t0 p0 => I (B m0 k x) x0 t0 p0 | L m0 k0 x0 y0 => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x0 x then m0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 else L (B m0 k x) k0 x0 y0 end : fmap -> dim -> dart -> fmap
succ = fun (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart) => A m k x <> nil : fmap -> dim -> dart -> Prop
dart = nat : Set
cA = fix cA (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart_dec x z then z else cA m0 k z | L m0 k0 x y => if eq_dim_dec k0 k then if eq_dart_dec x z then y else if eq_dart_dec (cA_1 m0 k y) z then cA m0 k x else cA m0 k z else cA m0 k z end with cA_1 (m : fmap) (k : dim) (z : dart) {struct m} : dart := match m with | V => nil | I m0 x _ _ => if eq_dart
Inductive dim : Set := zero : dim | one : dim
Inductive fmap : Set := V : fmap | I : fmap -> dart -> tag -> point -> fmap | L : fmap -> dim -> dart -> dart -> fmap
Md0.k = zero : dim
succ_bottom : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> bottom m k x <> A m k x
cA_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA m j z
cA_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z
cA_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = (if eq_dart_dec x z then bottom m k x else if eq_dart_dec (top m k x) z then A m k x else cA m k z)
A_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A m k x -> A_1 (B m k x) k y = A_1 m k y
cA_cA_1_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> ~ succ m k x -> cA (B m k x) k z = cA m k z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) k z = cA_1 m k z
inv_hmap_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> inv_hmap (L (B m k x) k x (A m k x))
A_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A m j z
ndZ_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> nd (B m k x) = nd m
eqc_eqc_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) x (A m k x) -> eqc m z t -> eqc (B m k x) z t
cA_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z
A_B_1_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> y <> A_1 m k x -> A (B_1 m k x) k y = A m k y
A_B_bis : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), y <> x -> A (B m k x) k y = A m k y
F_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in F (L (B m k x) k x y) z = F m z
exd_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in exd (L (B m k x) k x y) z < -> exd m z
cF_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cF (L (B m k x) k x y) z = cF m z
A_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> A (B m k x) k x = nil
A_cA : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x y : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m x -> exd m y -> A m k x = y -> cA m k x = y
cA_cA_1_B_ter : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> k <> j -> cA (B m k x) j z = cA m j z /\ cA_1 (B m k x) j z = cA_1 m j z
A_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in A_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = A_1 m j z
cA_1_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k j : dim) (x z : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let y := A m k x in cA_1 (L (B m k x) k x y) j z = cA_1 m j z
eqc_B_eqc : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x z t : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> eqc (B m k x) z t -> eqc m z t
nv_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nv m1 = nv m
ne_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in ne m1 = ne m
ndZ_L_B : forall (m : fmap) (k : dim) (x : dart), inv_hmap m -> succ m k x -> let m1 := L (B m k x) k x (A m k x) in nd m1 = nd m

```coq
intros m k x Hinv Hsucc.
unfold succ in Hsucc.
rewrite <- (A_B m k x Hinv) in Hsucc.
rewrite <- (cA_B m k x Hinv Hsucc) in Hsucc.
destruct (eq_dart_dec x x) as [Hxx | Hxx]; try discriminate.
destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x) as [Htx | Htx]; try discriminate.
apply succ_bottom with (m := m) (k := k) (x := x); auto.
Qed.```

original: intros m k x Hinv Hsucc. unfold succ in Hsucc. rewrite <- (A_B m k x Hinv) in Hsucc. rewrite <- (cA_B m k x Hinv Hsucc) in Hsucc. destruct (eq_dart_dec x x) as [Hxx | Hxx]; try discriminate. destruct (eq_dart_dec (top m k x) x) as [Htx | Htx]; try discriminate. apply succ_bottom with (m := m) (k := k) (x := x); auto.
